thread.title: Cleveland Browns' loss in San Diego wakes up the echoes -- Bud Shaw's You Said It
thread.title_full: Cleveland Browns' loss in San Diego wakes up the echoes -- Bud Shaw's You Said It | cleveland.com

author: Bud Shaw, Northeast Ohio Media Group
title: Cleveland Browns' loss in San Diego wakes up the echoes -- Bud Shaw's You Said It
text:
CLEVELAND, Ohio -- You Said It is based on the premise that the only thing Cleveland sports fans need more than a championship is a sense of humor...
YOU SAID IT
Bud: Does Mike Pettine always play the quarterback who gives the team the best chance of almost winning? -- Bob Sammon, Seven Hills
No. Just almost always.
Bud: Mike Pettine thanks Tramon Williams for his effort after an offsides call gives the Chargers a win. Is there a good penalty prize? – Judy, Rocky River
Yes. But it varies by position. For a Browns defensive back, you get to cover Dwayne Bowe in the next practice.
Bud: Jumping offsides on the potential game-winning field goal try is the worst play we've seen since 1999! -- The Dwayne Rudd Backers Organization
Don't lose your head now.
Bud: Dwayne Bowe is stealing from the Browns! – A. Rison, Atlanta, Ga.
As I remember, one of your better tries, sir.
Bud: I gave up my Browns season tickets of 29 years in 1991, at the end of the Bud Carson regime. Have I missed anything? -- Richard Wirth, Reminderville
In the interest of brevity, I can tell you the Browns made a move. Just not in the standings.
Bud: The Browns' plans for making the other team's players prepare for things they might not see, such as Terrelle Pryor and Johnny Manziel "packages," is a sound strategy. I checked with Manti Te'o 's girlfriend and she agrees. -- Pat
You Said It winners are legends in their own mind.
